channel.title: Movies on Z10Z
channel.description: Recent content in Movies on Z10Z

item.title: Movies
item.description: …Keeping track of movies I’ve seen (that I remember). I must’ve seen way more, if I were to count television and movie theatres, so I’ll be counting only movies I’ve seen as some sort of digital media (disk, streaming, etc). For this purpose, I’ve created this blog, which makes much easier to keep a visual registry in a way that I like, which is putting just the most memorable quote and/or still frame of the movie.
